frontmatter.title: Combining html and parsed tailwindcss in a single html file

node.html: Here I wanted to write html with tailwind in a file and afterward the generated CSS from the tailwind will be combined in the head of that HTML file so that I can only use that HTML with without any outside dependency.
This is where I document everything I do related to devops. Every time I tinker with different things and make them work, I document the process for future reference.

This extension got Featured in the chrome web store.

When working with swagger, I had to keep track of 10+ different JWT token. I used to do that by saving all these in a file and copy pasting them when I need one of them. Another problem was that every time I had to reload the page the token would get removed and I would have to apply the token all over again.

So I made this extension to do all these. It can apply token in swagger UI page. Or it can copy to clipboard.

Here I wanted to learn how to use Zookeeper. So I tried to tackle one of the problem of a distributed system that is leader election.

I wrote a blog about it as well.
This a online application I have developed using the Java's Spring framework. My main focus during the development of this application was to learn a completely new thing.
This was a interesting project where I had to swap image blocks randomly using only basic javascript. Also had to make the page responsive.
I wanted to learn how to do component testing and end to end testing for my project that's why I started this.
This is a very simple blogging website. I built when learning laravel This website has working signup and signin. A simple blog posting.

This is a computer software that was built out of necessity. In our Computer Programming Club we sometimes arrange different progrmaming contest that is hosted on Vjudge platform. So there were a need to give the participant a hardcopy of the problem set. This is tool was made to do just that.
